text: The Vitréais is a Breton cake. It is a specialty of Vitré, a city in eastern Brittany, France. It is a cake made of apples with salted butter caramel, eggs and almonds. ==References== ==External links== * Recipe for the Vitréais: an easy recipe on how to make the vitréais at home Category:Breton cuisine Category:French desserts Category:Cakes Category:Apple products Category:Apple dishes
title: Vitréais
